targets.query:
from(bucket: "homebridge")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "TemperatureSensor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ServiceName"]  == "SwitchBot Meter Living")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _measurement: "Current Temp", _value: r._value }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_measurement", "_value"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> yield(name: "Current Temp")

  |> yield(name: "Current Hum")

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

import "math"
import "timezone"

from(bucket: "homebridge")
  |> range(start: -56d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "HeaterCooler" or r["_measurement"] == "Fan")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ServiceName"] == "Daikin AC Living")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Active" or r["_field"] == "On")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_measurement", "_field", "_value"])
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_measurement", "_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.Fan_On > 0)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _value: 1 }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: r._value * 5}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, location: timezone.location(name: "Asia/Singapore"), createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: float(v: r._value) / 60.0}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1w, fn: mean, location: timezone.location(name: "Asia/Singapore"))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: r._value}))
  |> timeShift(duration: 8h)
  |> timeShift(duration: -1ms)
  |> truncateTimeColumn(unit: 1d)
  |> timeShift(duration: 16h)
  |> rename(columns: {"_time": "_time", "_value": "Uptime (Room: Living)"})
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "Uptime (Room: Living)"])
  |> yield(name: "Uptime (Room: Living)")

import "math"
import "timezone"

from(bucket: "homebridge")
  |> range(start: -56d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "HeaterCooler" or r["_measurement"] == "Fan")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Active" or r["_field"] == "On")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_measurement", "ServiceName", "_field", "_value"])
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["ServiceName", "_time"], columnKey: ["_measurement", "_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.Fan_On > 0 and r.HeaterCooler_Active == 0)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _room: r.ServiceName, _time: r._time, _value: 1 }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_room", "_time", "_value"])
  |> group(columns: ["_room"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: r._value * 5}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, location: timezone.location(name: "Asia/Singapore"), createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: float(v: r._value) / 60.0}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1w, fn: mean, location: timezone.location(name: "Asia/Singapore"))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: r._value}))
  |> timeShift(duration: 8h)
  |> timeShift(duration: -1ms)
  |> truncateTimeColumn(unit: 1d)
  |> timeShift(duration: 16h)
  |> rename(columns: {"_time": "_time", "_value": "Uptime (Mode: Dehumidification)"})
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "Uptime (Mode: Dehumidification)"])
  |> yield(name: "Uptime (Mode: Dehumidification)")

import "math"
import "timezone"

from(bucket: "homebridge")
  |> range(start: -56d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "HeaterCooler" or r["_measurement"] == "Fan")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Active" or r["_field"] == "On" or r["_field"] == "RotationSpeed")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_measurement", "ServiceName", "_field", "_value"])
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["ServiceName", "_time"], columnKey: ["_measurement", "_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.Fan_On > 0 and r.HeaterCooler_Active > 0 and r.Fan_RotationSpeed < 10)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _room: r.ServiceName, _time: r._time, _value: 1 }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_room", "_time", "_value"])
  |> group(columns: ["_room"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: r._value * 5}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, location: timezone.location(name: "Asia/Singapore"), createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: float(v: r._value) / 60.0}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1w, fn: mean, location: timezone.location(name: "Asia/Singapore"))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: r._value}))
  |> timeShift(duration: 8h)
  |> timeShift(duration: -1ms)
  |> truncateTimeColumn(unit: 1d)
  |> timeShift(duration: 16h)
  |> rename(columns: {"_time": "_time", "_value": "Uptime (Mode: Cooling/Silent)"})
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "Uptime (Mode: Cooling/Silent)"])
  |> yield(name: "Uptime (Mode: Cooling/Silent)")

import "math"
import "timezone"

from(bucket: "homebridge")
  |> range(start: -56d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "HeaterCooler" or r["_measurement"] == "Fan")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Active" or r["_field"] == "On" or r["_field"] == "RotationSpeed")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_measurement", "ServiceName", "_field", "_value"])
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["ServiceName", "_time"], columnKey: ["_measurement", "_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.Fan_On > 0 and r.HeaterCooler_Active > 0 and r.Fan_RotationSpeed >= 10)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _room: r.ServiceName, _time: r._time, _value: 1 }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_room", "_time", "_value"])
  |> group(columns: ["_room"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: r._value * 5}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, location: timezone.location(name: "Asia/Singapore"), createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: float(v: r._value) / 60.0}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1w, fn: mean, location: timezone.location(name: "Asia/Singapore"))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: r._value}))
  |> timeShift(duration: 8h)
  |> timeShift(duration: -1ms)
  |> truncateTimeColumn(unit: 1d)
  |> timeShift(duration: 16h)
  |> rename(columns: {"_time": "_time", "_value": "Uptime (Mode: Cooling/Auto)"})
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "Uptime (Mode: Cooling/Auto)"])
  |> yield(name: "Uptime (Mode: Cooling/Auto)")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._ac_mode == 0)
